thread.title: Google posts profit of $3.98 billion in third quarter
thread.title_full: Google posts profit of $3.98 billion in third quarter

title: Google posts profit of $3.98 billion in third quarter
text:
Google posts profit of $3.98 billion in third quarter 
Canada.com Friday 23rd October, 2015 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. - MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. (AP) _ Google Inc. (GOOG) on Thursday reported third-quarter net income of $3.98 billion.On a per-share basis, the Mountain View, California-based company said it had profit of $5.73. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense, came to $7.35 per share.The Internet search leader posted revenue of $15.11 billion in the period.Google shares have increased 24 per cent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has stayed nearly flat. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $651.79, a climb of 23 per cent in ...
